data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martynov, Alexander, Mehrotra, Rahul, Chavanich, Suchana, Nakano, Rie, Kashio, Sho, Lundin, Kennet, Picton, Bernard, Korshunova, Tatiana (2019): The extraordinary genus Myja is not a tergipedid, but related to the Facelinidae s. str. with the addition of two new species from Japan (Mollusca, Nudibranchia). ZooKeys 818: 89-116, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.818.30477, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.818.30477
